channel.title: Help sorry for another post
channel.description: does anybody know how to make 2 accs login at the same time cause right now i have the connection per ip set to 4 and one acc is logged in to that ip and another is trying to but cant does anybody know how to fix

item.title: Help sorry for another post
item.dc:creator: @TimmahPwnz TimmahPwnz
item.description:
@TimmahPwnz wrote:

I Know =] Me And My Friend Do This All The Time, If Your Doing What Im Thinking?

##################

TeamVeiwer Will Help!

##################

Okay Now, Ill Asume Your On Vista…

Vista|| Right Click Connection Button (Bottom Right)>> Network And Sharing Centre

Connection Blah Blah Blah View Status >> Details >> IPv4 IP Address Your Ip

Get Them To Connect Via That IP (You To) That’s If You Are Using The Same Internet Connection

Read full topic
